topAnime.title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
topAnime.description: After a failed alchemical ritual leaves brothers Edward and Alphonse Elric with severely damaged bodies, they begin searching for the one thing that can save them; the legendary Philosopher's Stone.

topAnime.title: Steins;Gate
topAnime.description: A self-proclaimed mad scientist discovers a way to time travel through a microwave, leading to a complex web of time manipulation and its consequences on the future of mankind.

topAnime.title: Attack on Titan Season 3 Part 2
topAnime.description: As the Survey Corps plans to retake Wall Maria, they uncover dark secrets about their world. The truth behind the Titans and their own existence will shake humanity to its core.

topAnime.title: Death Note
topAnime.description: A high school student discovers a supernatural notebook that allows him to kill anyone by writing the victim's name, leading him to attempt to create a crime-free world as a god-like vigilante.

topAnime.title: Demon Slayer
topAnime.description: In Taisho-era Japan, Tanjiro Kamado becomes a demon slayer after his family is slaughtered and his sister turned into a demon. He embarks on a dangerous journey to cure his sister and avenge his family.

topAnime.title: One Punch Man
topAnime.description: Saitama is a hero who only became a hero for fun. After three years of special training, he's become so strong that he's practically invincible. In fact, he's too strongâ€”even his mightiest opponents are taken out with a single punch.

topAnime.title: My Hero Academia
topAnime.description: In a world where 80% of the population has superpowers, Izuku Midoriya, a boy born without powers, enrolls in a prestigious hero academy to fulfill his dream of becoming the greatest hero.

topAnime.title: Hunter x Hunter (2011)
topAnime.description: Gon Freecss aspires to become a Hunter, an exceptional being capable of greatness. With his friends and his potential, he seeks for his father who left him when he was younger.

topAnime.title: Jujutsu Kaisen
topAnime.description: Yuji Itadori, a high school student with extraordinary physical abilities, gets involved in the world of Cursed Spirits after swallowing a powerful cursed object to save his friends.

topAnime.title: Code Geass
topAnime.description: After being exiled from his homeland, Lelouch, a prince of the Britannian Empire, gains the power to control others' minds. He uses this ability to lead a rebellion against his father's empire.

featuredAnime.title: Attack on Titan
featuredAnime.description: Humanity lives inside cities surrounded by enormous walls due to the Titans, gigantic humanoid creatures who devour humans seemingly without reason.

featuredAnime.title: Death Note
featuredAnime.description: A high school student discovers a supernatural notebook that allows him to kill anyone by writing the victim's name, leading him to attempt to create a crime-free world.

featuredAnime.title: Fullmetal Alchemist
featuredAnime.description: Two brothers search for the Philosopher's Stone after an attempt to revive their dead mother goes wrong, leading to the loss of their bodies.

featuredAnime.title: One Punch Man
featuredAnime.description: The story of Saitama, a hero who can defeat any opponent with a single punch but seeks to find a worthy opponent after growing bored by a lack of challenge.

featuredAnime.title: Demon Slayer
featuredAnime.description: A young boy becomes a demon slayer after his family is slaughtered and his sister is turned into a demon, seeking to restore her humanity.

featuredAnime.title: My Hero Academia
featuredAnime.description: In a world of superheroes, a powerless boy enrolls in a prestigious hero academy to become the greatest hero, like his idol All Might.
